document:
<sentence id="s1" text="This study investigated the role of potassium channel gene li>(potassium ion transmembrane transport) polymorphisms in high myopia.">
<sentence id="s2" text="Five tag single-nucleotide polymorphisms (SNPs) of li>potassium ion transmembrane transport were genotyped, and association testing with high myopia was conducted using logistic regression analysis adjusted for negative regulation of cell adhesion and age to give li>Pasym values, and multiple comparisons were corrected by permutation test to give li>Pemp values.">
<sentence id="s3" text="The SNP rs7744813, previously shown to be associated with refractive error and myopia in two GWAS, showed an odds ratio of 0.75 (95% CI 0.63-0.90; li>Pemp = 0.0058) for the positive regulation of glucose transmembrane transport allele.">
<sentence id="s4" text="Our data support the involvement of li>potassium ion transmembrane transport gene polymorphisms in the genetic susceptibility to high myopia and further exploration of li>KCNQ5 as a risk factor for high myopia">
